description: This file defines data models for notes, a repository interface, and an in-memory singleton implementation for storing and managing notes with reactive flows.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: Data class representing a note with id, title, content, creation and update timestamps.

classes.name: InMemoryNoteRepository
classes.description: Singleton object implementing NoteRepository using in-memory storage with reactive StateFlow.

methods.name: notes
methods.description: Returns a StateFlow emitting the list of all notes, ordered by latest update.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Fetches a single note by its ID, or null if not found.

methods.name: upsert
methods.description: Creates or updates a note; updates timestamps accordingly; returns the note ID.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Removes a note from the repository by its ID.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Triggers a re-emission of the current state; in-memory no-op but can be used for persistence.
